website_summaries.verdict: A well-made skimmer with a net that isn't practical for all pool cleaning tasks, but the impressive lifetime warranty still makes it a good deal.
pros: Features a sturdy build and deep net capable of collecting thick debris such as leaves and sticks
Can reach the bottom of most pools, and is lightweight enough to accomplish this task without much strain
Backed by a lifetime replacement warranty
cons: The mesh seems more suited for catching larger items, as smaller debris has been known to fall through the holes
Mesh can tear after a few weeks or months of use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pool Rake!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pool rake for over a year. It is the best pool rake I have used in the 20+ years of cleaning my pool. It is designed to hold a significant amount of debris without spilling it back into the water when you are moving it through the pool. The lip is angled perfectly to allow for collection of the smallest pieces on the bottom. It seems very durable considering I have used it several times a week for more than a year and it is showing no signs of wear. The price of this rake makes it a bargain when I think about how many cheap skimmers I have been through over the years.
customer_reviews.author: S.Amico

customer_reviews.title: Liking it
customer_reviews.text: I have a pond with a lot of algae and a huge tree, so I get a lot of leaves. In using this I was tickled that I could get so many leaves and even some algae in it. The first time it was so heavy I could hardly lift but the rake didn't even bend. I broke a skimmer I got from Lowe's that way. Even though it was more than what I wanted to pay I feel like this will be around until the net gets a whole in it or something.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buie

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Rake worked well at first but tore badly with normal wear and tear. Do not recommend. Will buy another item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last three years
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last three years. Emailed CJ Lifestyle through Amazon and they have not responded. Don't expect the Lifetime replacement to be honored.
customer_reviews.author: RIX

customer_reviews.title: Great take and awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool rake! I love how it has a sharper end on one side so it easily grabs leaves on the bottom of the pool. The basket is wide and fits a ton of debris. It's much better quality than you find at a typical pool supply store. The customer service is also great. They are fast and responsive to any issues I encountered during my warranty period. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: suzysoextra

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rake in September, 2015, and was disappointed to find out in less than 2 years I had a good sized hole near middle depth of the netting. I contacted the seller today through Amazon with a picture of my pool rake, and received an e-mail this evening letting me know I should receive a replacement within the next 7 days. I wish more companies backed their products this well. Thanks CJ Lifestyle!! p.s. What began as a disappointing event has ended with me deciding to buy the fine mesh version of this product for making a 2nd pass to get the very small debris. The same lifetime guarantee is included with that product also.
customer_reviews.author: John De Plume

customer_reviews.title: Skimmer = Good.  Customer Service = Bad.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this skimmer, because the quality looked good and the seller touted a "Lifetime Guarantee". The price was a bit higher than other quality skimmers, but I thought that the warranty justified the higher price. The skimmer was well built and performed as hoped, but it finally gave out on me. So I contacted the seller (twice) to utilize the guarantee, but have received no replies. So much for their guarantee or integrity ...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Knight

customer_reviews.title: For a pool guy like me this isn't the best net to use but ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a hole in less than 2 weeks. They sent me a new one which I hope lasts longer. The net is not as strong or durable as I thought it would be from the "heavy duty" in the description. I've had others that lasted way longer but cost a little more. For a pool guy like me this isn't the best net to use but for a pool owner I'm sure it'll last longer than it did for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not for gnats
customer_reviews.text: If you live in Florida and have a problem with gnats in your pool....this is not what you want! I skim the pool only to watch all the bugs flow right through the net. It looks great, it has 3 layers of net (but the layers are on the bottom which, when you’re skimming is submerged?)...so when you skim the pool the surface bugs just flow through the large mesh part of the net. This net may work for folks who only have to deal with large debris, but for me it was a huge fail.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kemp

customer_reviews.title: LIfetime Warranty in print only
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it primarily because of the so-stated "Lifetime Warranty". The fabric started to dry rot and tear after 3 1/2 seasons of usage. Tried contacting the seller, no response. Guess it's a lifetime warranty in print only.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best quality leaf rake for the money
customer_reviews.text: The best quality leaf rake I've ever owned. The proof will come with time to see whether it lasts, but it's very well constructed heavy duty metal with plastic and the net is far superior to any I've seen. The company's very consumer friendly as they immediately reached out via email to learn what I think about their product. The only reason I'm not giving a 5 star to to see how it holds up and see if their replacement warranty is as stated. For right now in the 4 weeks that I've owned it, it's a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: X3 for me

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a winner
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Crystal Pool Rake. I was very impressed with the high quality of construction. I have been a pool owner for over 40 yrs and gone through many pool baskets. This construction appears to top them all. However time will tell as I have been down that road before. I'm a materials engineer and the problem with plastic products is the deterioration of the plasticizer component due mainly to sun uv. Store the rake out of the sun to be safe,
customer_reviews.author: Lorelle M. Swope

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well built rake for skimming pool debris off the surface and bottom of pool.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this rake for 3 months now and am very pleased with it. The mesh doesn't allow all the little seeds and things that blow into the pool to escape. I use this to skim the surface as well at the bottom of the pool. Using it for surface cleaning allows me to capture quite a bit of debris before I have to empty the sack. The lip on the edge does a good job of lifting debris off the bottom of the pool and scooping it into the sack.
customer_reviews.author: Lois V.

customer_reviews.title: No replacements, but guaranteed for Life!
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime garranty but they don’t say how to contact them and they have no replacements available. The quality is not much better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Pool Rake
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty professional grade pool rake that looks to be very durable. I've only used it a few times so far, but it seems to work very well. It does seem to be somewhat heavy to move around when used with a heavy duty pole, especially if using it to skim the surface of the pool. Overall, looks well made and should last for a long time. If not, CJ Lifestyle has a GREAT return policy - if it ever breaks they will replace it! They also have a lot of pool cleaning and maintenance tips that they've emailed which are very helpful - THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Rake does a great job of slurping up leaves like a vacuum cleaner. It has a lot of capacity so you can pick up a lot of leaves before the bag has to be emptied. Customer Service has been in touch with me already to make sure that I'm pleased with the product. I highly recommend both the company and the product and I will not hesitate to do business with them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jones

customer_reviews.title: but so far I am pleased. I don’t understand why sellers want your feedback ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I haven’t had it long and the pool season is now over, but so far I am pleased. I don’t understand why sellers want your feedback almost immediately after you’ve received the item. How would I possibly know how good it is after 2 weeks?
customer_reviews.author: Nubbins

customer_reviews.title: This has a very good design that makes retrieving items from the bottom of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this rake for 2 seasons and for clean up after a hurricane. I will not use anything else. This has a very good design that makes retrieving items from the bottom of your pool easy and quick. It stands up to heavy use like a champ! No more cheaply made pool rakes for me. Too bad this company does not make power equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made pool rake!
customer_reviews.text: The best quality leaf rake I've ever owned and not the cheap rakes available at big box stores It is very well constructed heavy duty metal with plastic and the net is far superior than the last rake I had and is constructed with a flat lip so you can catch the nasty little leave that sink to the bottom of the pool The company seem very consumer friendly and time will tell if their lifetime warranty really works
customer_reviews.author: Spindletop

customer_reviews.title: Only used it once so far, but far exceeded ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, but far exceeded expectations. Have a lot of debris at the bottom of my pool because of tree cover. The rake scoops up quite a bit at a time and the weight didn't seem to strain it. We'll see how it holds up under repeated use, but the underlying metal frame gives me hope that it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank DLT

customer_reviews.title: I was a little skeptical about spending the money for the net but I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Very well made pool rake! Durable and yet soft enough to chase items below the water level by dragging it along the pebbletec. It catches the smaller items floating around the pool. I was a little skeptical about spending the money for the net but I am glad I did. Very happy with the product. In the past, I went cheap and I got what I paid for... this rake will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Z.

customer_reviews.title: ..handle on this .... . ..? Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: The rake arrived in excellent time and in good condition. It is a quality product. But, I didn't pay attention to the short handle....silly me! Even though I. Have a very small pool of water. ....?. Does anyone know who sells a pole, that will fit onto the little handle of the net? One that will stay on, and is light weight , preferably!
customer_reviews.author: JAN C

customer_reviews.title: Good Product & Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have been through many Pool Rakes over the years and although I have only had the Crystal Rake for a short time, it appears to be stronger than all my previous purchases. In addition, the leading edge of the Rake is "sharp" and makes it very easy to pick up leaves from the bottom of the pool. Finally, I have been contacted by Customer Service and in addition to making sure I am happy with the Rake, they supplied some helpful cleaning tips.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 4 seasons
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for 4 seasons..needs replacement..but cant email seller. Can someone help?
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great net, not sure about warranty...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the net in October 2016, so almost 3 years old. It is a good net but net is getting holes in it now. Wrote the vendor twice about warranty replacement and have never heard back. Good net but a little pricey without the warranty being held up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works good as designed
customer_reviews.text: Works good to clean the pool. We have exposed aggregate and this does a good job on the pool and even the spa. The corners are good at cleaning the sides of the spa ledge. I am hoping the extra layer of netting will keep this net around longer. The edge is efficient at getting leaves off the bottom, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marta SolitaireTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice net a lot better than the cheapo net that I had. This one can be flipped over to remove its contents. It's big and therefore has some resistance moving through the water but can hold a lot. I am a man with good upper body strength.... Consider the smaller one of you are of smaller size for easier mobility.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Soft netting very helpful in emptying
customer_reviews.text: This net works well getting small items to pop in off the bottom and exceptionally well at emptying. Just turn it over and it automatically inverts so you can spin it to get the cling-ons off. Other nets I've had won't invert because they are too stiff. I've notice that the stiff ones don't last as long either.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K Clowe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. After two years of use the net ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. After two years of use the net gave out, but the lifetime replacement went easy and we now have a new net. I highly suggest purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Frank

customer_reviews.title: Surely there was a better option. It is sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: We needed to get up a bunch of leaves after a storm this fall. Our skimmer was not enough and vacuuming it up was a pain. Surely there was a better option. It is sturdy and effective. You do have to use a little strength to haul up the leaves, but having it helped make cleaning the pool out much easier.
customer_reviews.author: A family

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looked to be very sturdy and well made. Time will tell but I am quite satisfied with the purchase this far. In case Hope that in case I need to take advantage of the no hastle replacement policy in the far distance future it will be an amicable and expedient experience. Just a thought.....
customer_reviews.author: Minh Vu

customer_reviews.title: Great Rake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove leaves et al from the bottom of our pool. I think it's pretty well made and I've picked up leaves, a plug, and the cover to the skimmer now with it. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

customer_reviews.title: FALSE LIFETIME WARRANTY! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Never got any responses back to have mine replaced. This is a fake “lifetime warranty”!
customer_reviews.author: STREETFIGHTER50

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rake and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: This pool rake is made of quality materials that are very durable. I can tell that it will stand up to heavy use without the net tearing or any other problems. And on the off chance that there is a problem, I already know that the company CJ Lifestyle will address it with their guarantee. They sent me an e-mail soon after I ordered the rake, with some helpful tips on using it. I had a question about the rake, and they replied within 1 day. That is outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Magalo

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Does a fine job. Better than the old one that I suffered with for years,
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, great for pond debris and easy to clean out
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times so far for cleaning the bottom of my pond. It's very sturdy, and way easier for picking up debris than the flat skimmer nets. I also like the double mesh to keep the big stuff from damaging the finer mesh. It's an easy attach/detach from the handle, and very simple to flip over and shake out the debris. When combined with a good, sturdy skimmer pole this should last for many years and make for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Fiske

customer_reviews.title: This pool rake works great. It's very sturdy and I'm able to pickup ...
customer_reviews.text: This pool rake works great. It's very sturdy and I'm able to pickup all the small debris that falls into our pool. We have had it for about a year and I noticed that one of the holes was starting to rip so I contacted the vendor and they sent me a replacement right away. I was impressed by the way this vendor stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick, but I'm not sure how this is expected to last more than a season or two. The mesh is pretty thin. I'll give it a chance - they have a lifetime warranty, after all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Rake!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of other pool rakes in the past. My neighbor has Eucaliptus trees and I am constantly getting their leaves in my pool. These leaves are long and skinny. The Crystal Pool Rake does a better job of catching these leaves. Definitely a good purchase. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry & Yulia Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Much better than any of the previous ones we have had
customer_reviews.text: This pool rake is worth every penny. I am confident it will last a very long time. Much better than any of the previous ones we have had. And the company is excellent at following through with information. Customer service before you need it! Very impressive
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rake and a JED telescoping pole at the same time. I use them to remove floating debris from around our dock. I am impressed by how sturdy this rake is. Top quality. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks good at first but doesn't last too long. Their lifetime warranty was just a scam. I've tried to contact seller several times over the past year, no response.
customer_reviews.author: JTG

customer_reviews.title: the perfect rake
customer_reviews.text: WHY DID I NOT BUY THIS EARILER!!! I'm such a bonehead this rake is perfect for my inground pool. It's everything the company says it is and more. Don't be cheap this is a great product with a lifetime warranty really? Perfect perfect thanks
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the BEsT pool rake on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This to be the last pool rake I will need to buy. More expensive than others, but a classic case of "you get what you pay for". ALL the other rakes I have purchased last 10-12 months. This rake will pay for itself in no time and I will have a vastly superior product with actual customer support. Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Superior Pool Net
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and gets the job done. The vendor is very customer-oriented and wants to know that his product is works for his customers. Highly recommend to anyone needing this item. The vendor also sent an email with helpful tips for the pool net use and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best pool rake!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pool rake I have ever purchased. It lasted me about five years and finally has developed holes in it. I need a replacement. How does that work?
customer_reviews.author: Eman Esmaily

customer_reviews.title: I got two of them and the one that I am using is AWESOME! Highly recommended if you are looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked around on Amazon and I found this net and picked it up after reading all of the positive reviews. I got two of them and the one that I am using is AWESOME ! Highly recommended if you are looking for a net to pick up that stubborn stuff in your pool, either on the surface or on the bottom of your pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ardron ™©®

customer_reviews.title: Quality is a 10
customer_reviews.text: Quality is above what was expected. We have a 50,000 gallon pool with a lot of debris after the Santa Ana winds blow. This rake makes a much faster debris removal process because of the large opening and large net.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Collins

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction - Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida, taking care of my pool is a year round job. I have gone through numerous cheaply made nets that all the local pool stores have which last me a few months before they wear out. This Pool Rake is advertised as "Heavy Duty" and compared to the others I've had it is certainly the case. For a few dollars more I got a net that should last me years instead of months and work better the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: With lifetime guarantee it is a good deal as well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality net. Frame is rigid and well shaped to make getting leaves off the bottom a snap. Netting is double thick and should be quite durable. With lifetime guarantee it is a good deal as well.
customer_reviews.author: jcbl

customer_reviews.title: Nice net
customer_reviews.text: I like this net very much. Wide mouth and sturdy construction. Picks up nicely from bottom and light enough to use as a surface skimmer easily. Net is soft enough to turn inside out to empty and return to normal without touching it or hitting poll on any surface. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: raybella

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Outside netting is not stitched to the seam. Makes me think it will not last. See photo. Just unboxed to use today.
customer_reviews.author: Preston M Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of leaves in my pool. ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of leaves in my pool. As others have said, this rake glides effortlessly across the bottom of the pool, and scoops up large quantities at a time. I also use it to get the floating leaves. It is a quality made product.
customer_reviews.author: -GDW

customer_reviews.title: Just under 3 months and the large mesh has ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: Just under 3 months and the large mesh has ripped from the bottom seam. If there is a warranty how does one make contact with seller? Clicking on Amazon buttons for return just takes one in circles.
customer_reviews.author: Airboss

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have been maintaining my pool for over 25 years & have replaced many pool rakes. This brand is the best & strongest I have come across. Their replacement warranty is unparalleled. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Rick McD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This net is by far the best pool net I've ever purchased. Very well built and does an excellent job of scooping heavy wet leaves from my pool cover. If you are looking for a strong well made product, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a sturdy net but wasn't fine enough to catch ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a sturdy net but wasn't fine enough to catch the small debris that my pool gets. I recommend the purity pool pro lite 18 inch over this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiber Box

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I used a pool rake. I used the flat skimmer in the past. I really like the rake. You can get the leaves and other stuff off the bottom of the pool as well as skim along the top of the water and without stopping to empty it like you have to with a skimmer. I've only had it a few weeks but so far it seems sturdy and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobyy23

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality - large enough for heavy duty on getting leaves out of my pool
customer_reviews.author: Victor Harris

customer_reviews.title: Bomb proof
customer_reviews.text: Great large size. Large great quality net. Very very rugged plastic and metal components. No need for a lifetime warrantee because this thing is bomb proof.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction both frame and net. Net has a tapered shape that makes it easy to dump.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A Eltoft

customer_reviews.title: Having the net so deep has the added benefit of ...
customer_reviews.text: Having the net so deep has the added benefit of making it easier to keep leaves from falling out when pausing to scoop leaves at bottom of pool
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Absolutely love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have Mesquite Trees in my back yard. I typically go through these type of nets in a couple months. I usually see wear in the first couple weeks. Not this brand. Its has been a month and no signs of wear. This is a great product. Absolutely love this purchase. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, large
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, large, works great, so much better than always replacing the broken plastic crap you get at the local pool store!
customer_reviews.author: N. DeNova

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This rake works well. It's light and moves very easily through the water. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, light weight, holds a lot of leaves, etc. Perfect pool rake. I'd buy again, but I doubt I'll need to buy one for a long time....
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it so I have only used it briefly. But is big and it is strong--the two things I was hoping for. So far it seems great. Thought it might be a tad expensive but it's a quality product so it seems well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: luluK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent-Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very solidly constructed. It is easy to use and traps debris of different size-it comes with life time warranty. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Honest customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great; smaller one might be even better.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Way better than the flat ones. If I was re-ordering, I would probably go with the narrower one for easier manuverability.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M

customer_reviews.title: Does a Good Job
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing a great job but it is a bit heavy. I have a large pond and it helps remove leaves and grass clippings.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Logan

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and constructed.  It looks like it will last for several seasons.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and constructed. The extra layer of mesh to protect the side of the bag nearest the handle, is a smart idea.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful2014

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product with outstanding customer service attitude
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pool rake to pick up lots of leaves with a deep net. It is a bit heavy that requires a bit more muscle to use compared to the light weight products. Customer service contact to make sure I am satisfied with the product is impressive and very much appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Gainesville Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet (TOO COLD! ). However ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet (TOO COLD!). However, it appears to be very well made - sturdiest rake I've owned, yet. I replace these about every 2 years, usually due to holes in the net.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, heavier and tougher than any other net I've ...
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, heavier and tougher than any other net I've owned and I've had many in the past 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict :)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Netting not as thick as our last one but most seem thin now. Arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pool rake I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: JCthunder

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this leaf rake; lightweight but very sturdy. But when I used it in the spring the netting ripped easily from the weight of the wet leaves. So back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rake, heavy duty and way easy to handle. I would solidly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rzaman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great net that is very sturdy and fairly light to handle getting leaves out of my pool.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Net is functional and durable but very heavy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Net is functional and durable but very heavy to use when fully extended. We use the flat type more.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bloomquist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This will be the last pool rake you will Ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Zeoli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. Is definitely heavier than my others, let's hope it lasts longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Little g

customer_reviews.title: Working Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for two weeks and it works a lot better than my old one & seems to be very sturdy. If the net wears out they say they'll replace the whole unit so we'll see. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: halonut

customer_reviews.title: This Pool rake helps to keep the pond clean so the fish can enjoy their habitat
customer_reviews.text: My Tropical Almond is over the Koi pond and is deciduous so this time of year I get large leaves in to pond. This Pool rake helps to keep the pond clean so the fish can enjoy their habitat.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Leyenberger

customer_reviews.title: Works Great... Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: After a season or so it seems that I have to replace the bag and that is the reason for this purchase. This seems to be a quality product. I picks up the debris from the bottom more easily than other bags I have used. What drew me to this product was their guarantee. It seems they will replace the product if it becomes damaged. It is worth the effort to have that guarantee. I will likely have to wait a season or so to test that guarantee, but I have confidence in Amazon. So far it is working perfectly. Seems heftier and stronger than others and way more than the cheap plastic ones. All good to know.
customer_reviews.author: Flats Man

customer_reviews.text: I bought this net for my mom to use in her pool and so far she loves it. Says she can tell it's high quality and likes that it's doubled lined.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 2 year pool owner and had been using a similar product from another company. This product is far superior, light weight but strong. It glides the thought the water easily and grabs the debre quickly.

customer_reviews.author: Randy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Rake But NOT Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pool leaf rake is better than the ones you buy at the box pool stores but it does have a major flaw. The lip of the rake should be more hydro active (make a turbulence via the lip) so that the debris in front of the rake is gently disturbed so that the rake can capture the debris more easily. A larger more water dynamic lip would solve this problem. With that said I would buy it again as the large bag is perfect for raking a lot if leaves off the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hunn

product_meta.title: Crystal Pool Rake, Heavy Duty / /, Modern Brushed Aluminium Heat Treated Leaf Scoop - Easy Glide Low Drag Skimmer Scoop - Double Stitched Net Bag, Double Layer Long Life Basket Netting - Fast Scoop.
product_meta.description: Cleaning Pools! Just one of those jobs you'd rather do quickly! The secret to having more Free Time is using the right tool for the job! Introducing CJ Lifestyles Crystal Pool Rake.- Light, Easy Glide Rim offers minimal resistance through the water. - Tapered Net for easy manoeuvrability. - Ideal Net Flex! Empties at a flip of the wrist. - Angled Leading Edge, scoops debris efficiently. - Close Knit Net collects fine debris. Light enough to manoeuvre quickly.
